title: Cardinal number arithmetic using Axiom of Choice

blocks.name: iunctb
blocks.content: The countable union of countable sets is countable (indexed union version of ~ unictb ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm iunctb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wral(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cdom, com))), wbr(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cdom, com))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl2anc(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wral(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cdom, com))), wbr(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cdom, com), wbr(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cdom, cxp(c0, com)), wbr(cxp(c0, com), cdom, com))
  iundomg(s0, c0, c1, com, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wral(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cdom, com))))
  eqid(ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)))
  sylc(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wral(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cdom, com))), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, co(com, cmap, c1)), wacn(c0)), wbr(c0, cdom, com), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, co(com, cmap, c1)), wacn(com)))
  syl6eleqr(ciun(s0, c0, co(com, cmap, c1)), wacn(com), universe, wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wral(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cdom, com))))
  sylancl(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wral(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cdom, com))), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, co(com, cmap, c1)), universe), wcel(c0, universe), wral(s0, c0, wcel(co(com, cmap, c1), universe)))
  adantr(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wral(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cdom, com)), wcel(c0, universe))
  rgenw(s0, c0, wcel(co(com, cmap, c1), universe))
  ovex(com, cmap, c1)
  iunexg(s0, c0, universe, co(com, cmap, c1), universe)
  acncc()
  acndom(c0, com, ciun(s0, c0, co(com, cmap, c1)))
  simpr(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wral(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cdom, com)))
  sylc(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wral(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cdom, com))), wcel(cxp(c0, com), wacn(ciun(s0, c0, c1))), wbr(cxp(c0, com), cdom, com), wcel(com, wacn(ciun(s0, c0, c1))))
  mpisyl(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wral(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cdom, com))), wcel(com, wacn(ciun(s0, c0, c1))), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), universe), wcel(com, cdm(ccrd)))
  syl2an(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wral(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cdom, com)), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), universe), wcel(c0, universe), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe)))
  ctex(c0)
  ralimi(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cdom, com), wcel(c1, universe))
  ctex(c1)
  iunexg(s0, c0, universe, c1, universe)
  ax-mp(wcel(com, cdm(ccrd)), wcel(com, con0))
  omelon()
  onenon(com)
  numacn(ciun(s0, c0, c1), universe, com)
  acndom2(cxp(c0, com), com, ciun(s0, c0, c1))
  sylancl(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wral(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cdom, com))), wbr(cxp(c0, com), cdom, com), wbr(cxp(c0, com), cdom, cxp(com, com)), wbr(cxp(com, com), cen, com))
  sylancr(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wral(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cdom, com))), wbr(cxp(c0, com), cdom, cxp(com, com)), wcel(com, universe), wbr(c0, cdom, com))
  omex()
  simpl(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wral(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cdom, com)))
  xpdom1g(com, universe, c0, com)
  xpomen()
  domentr(cxp(c0, com), cxp(com, com), com)
  domtr(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cxp(c0, com), com)
  diff.com.s(s0)
}

thm iunctb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1[‚âº]_om))‚Üí ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)[‚âº]_om)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl2anc((c0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1[‚âº]_om)), ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)[‚âº]_om, ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)[‚âº](c0 √ó _om), (c0 √ó _om)[‚âº]_om)
  iundomg(s0, c0, c1, com, ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0,({ s0 } √ó c1)), (c0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1[‚âº]_om)))
  eqid(‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0,({ s0 } √ó c1)))
  sylc((c0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1[‚âº]_om)), ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0,(_om[‚Ü¶]c1))‚àà AC(c0), c0[‚âº]_om, ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0,(_om[‚Ü¶]c1))‚àà AC(_om))
  syl6eleqr(‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0,(_om[‚Ü¶]c1)), AC(_om), universe, (c0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1[‚âº]_om)))
  sylancl((c0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1[‚âº]_om)), ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0,(_om[‚Ü¶]c1))‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà ùïå, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(_om[‚Ü¶]c1)‚àà ùïå))
  adantr(c0[‚âº]_om, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1[‚âº]_om), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  rgenw(s0, c0, (_om[‚Ü¶]c1)‚àà ùïå)
  ovex(com, cmap, c1)
  iunexg(s0, c0, universe, (_om[‚Ü¶]c1), universe)
  acncc()
  acndom(c0, com, ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0,(_om[‚Ü¶]c1)))
  simpr(c0[‚âº]_om, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1[‚âº]_om))
  sylc((c0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1[‚âº]_om)), (c0 √ó _om)‚àà AC(‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)), (c0 √ó _om)[‚âº]_om, _om ‚àà AC(‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)))
  mpisyl((c0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1[‚âº]_om)), _om ‚àà AC(‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)), ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚àà ùïå, _om ‚àà dom(card))
  syl2an(c0[‚âº]_om, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1[‚âº]_om), ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà ùïå, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà ùïå))
  ctex(c0)
  ralimi(s0, c0, c1[‚âº]_om, c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  ctex(c1)
  iunexg(s0, c0, universe, c1, universe)
  ax-mp(_om ‚àà dom(card), _om ‚àà On)
  omelon()
  onenon(com)
  numacn(‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), universe, com)
  acndom2((c0 √ó _om), com, ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1))
  sylancl((c0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1[‚âº]_om)), (c0 √ó _om)[‚âº]_om, (c0 √ó _om)[‚âº](_om √ó _om), (_om √ó _om)[‚âÖ]_om)
  sylancr((c0[‚âº]_om ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1[‚âº]_om)), (c0 √ó _om)[‚âº](_om √ó _om), _om ‚àà ùïå, c0[‚âº]_om)
  omex()
  simpl(c0[‚âº]_om, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, c1[‚âº]_om))
  xpdom1g(com, universe, c0, com)

  diff.com.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: unictb
blocks.content: The countable union of countable sets is countable. Theorem 6Q of [Enderton] p. 159. See ~ iunctb for indexed union version. (Contributed by NM, 26-Mar-2006.)

blocks.name: infmap
blocks.content: An exponentiation law for infinite cardinals. Similar to Lemma 6.2 of [Jech] p. 43. (Contributed by NM, 1-Oct-2004.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: alephadd
blocks.content: The sum of two alephs is their maximum. Equation 6.1 of [Jech] p. 42. (Contributed by NM, 29-Sep-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm alephadd(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wbr(co(cfv(cale, c0), ccda, cfv(cale, c1)), cen, cun(cfv(cale, c0), cfv(cale, c1)))
} = {
  pm2.61ii(wbr(co(cfv(cale, c0), ccda, cfv(cale, c1)), cen, cun(cfv(cale, c0), cfv(cale, c1))), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, con0))
  ex(wn(wcel(c0, con0)), wn(wcel(c1, con0)), wbr(co(cfv(cale, c0), ccda, cfv(cale, c1)), cen, cun(cfv(cale, c0), cfv(cale, c1))))
  mpsyl(wa(wn(wcel(c0, con0)), wn(wcel(c1, con0))), wbr(co(cfv(cale, c0), ccda, cfv(cale, c1)), cen, cun(cfv(cale, c0), cfv(cale, c1))), wcel(co(cfv(cale, c0), ccda, cfv(cale, c1)), universe), wceq(co(cfv(cale, c0), ccda, cfv(cale, c1)), cun(cfv(cale, c0), cfv(cale, c1))))
  ovex(cfv(cale, c0), ccda, cfv(cale, c1))
  syl2anbr(wn(wcel(c0, con0)), wn(wcel(c1, con0)), wceq(co(cfv(cale, c0), ccda, cfv(cale, c1)), cun(cfv(cale, c0), cfv(cale, c1))), wn(wcel(c0, cdm(cale))), wn(wcel(c1, cdm(cale))))
  notbii(wcel(c0, cdm(cale)), wcel(c0, con0))
  eleq2i(c0, cdm(cale), con0)
  notbii(wcel(c1, cdm(cale)), wcel(c1, con0))
  eleq2i(c1, cdm(cale), con0)
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(cale), con0), wfn(cale, con0))
  alephfnon()
  fndm(cale, con0)
  3eqtr4a(co(cfv(cale, c0), ccda, cfv(cale, c1)), cun(cfv(cale, c0), cfv(cale, c1)), co(emptycls, ccda, emptycls), emptycls, wa(wn(wcel(c0, cdm(cale))), wn(wcel(c1, cdm(cale)))))
  3eqtr2i(co(emptycls, ccda, emptycls), emptycls, cun(cxp(emptycls, csn(emptycls)), cxp(emptycls, csn(c1o))), cxp(emptycls, cun(csn(emptycls), csn(c1o))))
  mp2an(wceq(co(emptycls, ccda, emptycls), cun(cxp(emptycls, csn(emptycls)), cxp(emptycls, csn(c1o)))), wcel(emptycls, universe), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  0ex()
  cdaval(emptycls, universe, emptycls, universe)
  xpundi(emptycls, csn(emptycls), csn(c1o))
  0xp(cun(csn(emptycls), csn(c1o)))
  oveqan12d(cfv(cale, c0), ccda, cfv(cale, c1), emptycls, emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, cdm(cale))), wn(wcel(c1, cdm(cale))))
  syl6eq(cun(cfv(cale, c0), cfv(cale, c1)), emptycls, cun(emptycls, emptycls), wa(wn(wcel(c0, cdm(cale))), wn(wcel(c1, cdm(cale)))))
  uneq12d(cfv(cale, c0), cfv(cale, c1), emptycls, emptycls, wa(wn(wcel(c0, cdm(cale))), wn(wcel(c1, cdm(cale)))))
  adantr(wn(wcel(c0, cdm(cale))), wn(wcel(c1, cdm(cale))), wceq(cfv(cale, c0), emptycls))
  ndmfv(c0, cale)
  adantl(wn(wcel(c0, cdm(cale))), wn(wcel(c1, cdm(cale))), wceq(cfv(cale, c1), emptycls))
  ndmfv(c1, cale)
  un0(emptycls)
  eqeng(co(cfv(cale, c0), ccda, cfv(cale, c1)), universe, cun(cfv(cale, c0), cfv(cale, c1)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, con0), wbr(co(cfv(cale, c0), ccda, cfv(cale, c1)), cen, cun(cfv(cale, c0), cfv(cale, c1))), wss(com, cfv(cale, c0)))
  alephgeom(c0)
  syl(wss(com, cfv(cale, c0)), wbr(co(cfv(cale, c0), ccda, cfv(cale, c1)), cen, cun(cfv(cale, c0), cfv(cale, c1))), wbr(com, cdom, cfv(cale, c0)))
  ax-mp(wi(wss(com, cfv(cale, c0)), wbr(com, cdom, cfv(cale, c0))), wcel(cfv(cale, c0), universe))
  fvex(cale, c0)
  ssdomg(cfv(cale, c0), universe, com)
  mp3an12(wbr(com, cdom, cfv(cale, c0)), wbr(co(cfv(cale, c0), ccda, cfv(cale, c1)), cen, cun(cfv(cale, c0), cfv(cale, c1))), wcel(cfv(cale, c0), cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cfv(cale, c1), cdm(ccrd)))
  infcda(cfv(cale, c0), cfv(cale, c1))
  sylbi(wcel(c1, con0), wbr(co(cfv(cale, c0), ccda, cfv(cale, c1)), cen, cun(cfv(cale, c0), cfv(cale, c1))), wss(com, cfv(cale, c1)))
  alephgeom(c1)
  syl(wss(com, cfv(cale, c1)), wbr(co(cfv(cale, c0), ccda, cfv(cale, c1)), cen, cun(cfv(cale, c0), cfv(cale, c1))), wbr(com, cdom, cfv(cale, c1)))
  ax-mp(wi(wss(com, cfv(cale, c1)), wbr(com, cdom, cfv(cale, c1))), wcel(cfv(cale, c1), universe))
  fvex(cale, c1)
  ssdomg(cfv(cale, c1), universe, com)
  syl6breq(co(cfv(cale, c0), ccda, cfv(cale, c1)), cen, cun(cfv(cale, c0), cfv(cale, c1)), cun(cfv(cale, c1), cfv(cale, c0)), wbr(com, cdom, cfv(cale, c1)))
  sylancr(wbr(com, cdom, cfv(cale, c1)), wbr(co(cfv(cale, c0), ccda, cfv(cale, c1)), cen, cun(cfv(cale, c1), cfv(cale, c0))), wbr(co(cfv(cale, c0), ccda, cfv(cale, c1)), cen, co(cfv(cale, c1), ccda, cfv(cale, c0))), wbr(co(cfv(cale, c1), ccda, cfv(cale, c0)), cen, cun(cfv(cale, c1), cfv(cale, c0))))
  cdacomen(cfv(cale, c0), cfv(cale, c1))
  mp3an12(wbr(com, cdom, cfv(cale, c1)), wbr(co(cfv(cale, c1), ccda, cfv(cale, c0)), cen, cun(cfv(cale, c1), cfv(cale, c0))), wcel(cfv(cale, c1), cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cfv(cale, c0), cdm(ccrd)))
  ax-mp(wcel(cfv(cale, c1), cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cfv(cale, c1), con0))
  alephon(c1)
  onenon(cfv(cale, c1))
  ax-mp(wcel(cfv(cale, c0), cdm(ccrd)), wcel(cfv(cale, c0), con0))
  alephon(c0)
  onenon(cfv(cale, c0))
  infcda(cfv(cale, c1), cfv(cale, c0))
  entr(co(cfv(cale, c0), ccda, cfv(cale, c1)), co(cfv(cale, c1), ccda, cfv(cale, c0)), cun(cfv(cale, c1), cfv(cale, c0)))
  uncom(cfv(cale, c1), cfv(cale, c0))
}

blocks.name: alephexp2
blocks.content: An expression equinumerous to 2 to an aleph power. The proof equates the two laws for cardinal exponentiation ~ alephexp1 (which works if the base is less than or equal to the exponent) and ~ infmap (which works if the exponent is less than or equal to the base). They can be equated only when the base is equal to the exponent, and this is the result. (Contributed by NM, 23-Oct-2004.)
blocks.origin:

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  mpbid(wcel(c0, con0), wbr(co(c2o, cmap, cfv(cale, c0)), cen, cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cale, c0)), wbr(cv(s0), cen, cfv(cale, c0))))), wbr(co(cfv(cale, c0), cmap, cfv(cale, c0)), cen, cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cale, c0)), wbr(cv(s0), cen, cfv(cale, c0))))))
  sylancl(wcel(c0, con0), wbr(co(cfv(cale, c0), cmap, cfv(cale, c0)), cen, cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cale, c0)), wbr(cv(s0), cen, cfv(cale, c0))))), wbr(com, cdom, cfv(cale, c0)), wbr(cfv(cale, c0), cdom, cfv(cale, c0)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, con0), wbr(com, cdom, cfv(cale, c0)), wss(com, cfv(cale, c0)))
  alephgeom(c0)
  ax-mp(wi(wss(com, cfv(cale, c0)), wbr(com, cdom, cfv(cale, c0))), wcel(cfv(cale, c0), universe))
  ssdomg(cfv(cale, c0), universe, com)
  ax-mp(wbr(cfv(cale, c0), cdom, cfv(cale, c0)), wcel(cfv(cale, c0), universe))
  fvex(cale, c0)
  domrefg(cfv(cale, c0), universe)
  infmap(s0, cfv(cale, c0), cfv(cale, c0))
  syl(wcel(c0, con0), wb(wbr(co(cfv(cale, c0), cmap, cfv(cale, c0)), cen, cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cale, c0)), wbr(cv(s0), cen, cfv(cale, c0))))), wbr(co(c2o, cmap, cfv(cale, c0)), cen, cab(s0, wa(wss(cv(s0), cfv(cale, c0)), wbr(cv(s0), cen, cfv(cale, c0)))))), wbr(co(cfv(cale, c0), cmap, cfv(cale, c0)), cen, co(c2o, cmap, cfv(cale, c0))))
